alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Jackson; Natchitoches; Red River; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 1:17AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, east central Red River, north central Natchitoches, southeastern Bienville and northwestern Winn Parishes through 200 AM CST... At 116 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Ringgold to 18 miles west of Jonesboro to 10 miles north of Campti. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Martin, Hodge, North Hodge, East Hodge, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Bienville, Quitman, Brice, Friendship, Liberty Hill, Chestnut and Mount Olive. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for north central and northwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Jackson; Natchitoches; Red River; Winn
